name: AdanaFightSimon
_source: s;Adana;Traitor! You won't live long enough to hang!
s;Simon;General, please! I had no idea what that artifact was!|I was only asked to retrieve it as a gift by Lord Morrissey.
s;Adana;Your words are too late, wretch. You have slain the last of the Trojan dynasty!|But have no fear - Lord Morrissey's head will be the next to fall from his shoulders.
